item.title: Eyewitness captures moment man tackles and disarms Bondi shooter
item.description: New South Wales Police say that 15 people were killed, plus one gunman, in a shooting at Bondi Beach targeting the Jewish community.

item.title: 'Hero' who wrestled gun from Bondi shooter named as Ahmed al Ahmed
item.description: Fruit shop owner Ahmed al Ahmed, 43, has undergone surgery for bullet wounds to his arm and hand.

item.title: 'Person of interest' detained over Brown University shooting to be released, officials say
item.description: Two people died and nine others were injured in the incident in Rhode Island on Saturday.

item.title: BBC reports from Bondi gunmen's suburban house
item.description: BBC News Australia correspondent Katy Watson visited the house in the Sydney suburb of Bonnyrigg.

item.title: LA police investigate 'apparent homicide' at Rob Reiner's home
item.description: Authorities were called the storied Hollywood director's home on Sunday and found the bodies of a man, 78, and a woman, 68.

item.title: 'Hero' who wrestled gun from Bondi shooter named as Ahmed al Ahmed
item.description: Fifteen people were killed in the shooting at Australia's Bondi Beach, as crowds attended an event to celebrate Hanukkah.

item.title: They were almost American - then Trump cancelled their citizenship ceremonies
item.description: Immigrants from among the 19 countries banned by the Trump administration tell the BBC how their citizenship ceremonies were abruptly cancelled.

item.title: Oxfam chief forced to step down over 'serious issues' with conduct, charity says
item.description: The charity's trustees say Dr Halima Begum's position was "untenable" following an independent review of her behaviour.

item.title: Mahomes tears ACL as Chiefs miss out on NFL play-offs
item.description: Patrick Mahomes suffers a major knee injury as the Kansas City Chiefs are ruled out of the NFL play-offs for the first time since the 2014 season.

item.title: 'Horror and heroism' at Bondi Beach
item.description: The deadly attack targeting a Jewish community event at Australia's Bondi Beach dominates the front pages of Monday's papers.

item.title: Dominatrix turns tech founder to combat revenge porn
item.description: After the humiliation of clients leaking her intimate images, Madelaine decided to take action.

item.title: Their diamond-rich land in South Africa was taken. Now they want it back
item.description: A two-decade old legal judgement should mean they are benefitting but they say they remain poor.

item.title: Balloons from Belarus are causing chaos in Lithuania. Is it smugglers or a hybrid attack?
item.description: Lithuania has declared an emergency after the balloons started to cross the border.

item.title: How common is a white Christmas where you are?
item.description: Many of us probably dream of a white Christmas but how often have you actually seen one? Simon King takes a look at new analysis.

item.title: Paramedic 'sent flying' in Liverpool parade attack
item.description: James Vernon said "adrenaline kicked in" allowing him to help the stricken victims of Paul Doyle.

item.title: Can I just check - are my emails holding me back at work?! Xx
item.description: What impact is my email etiquette having on how I'm perceived, evaluated and promoted at work?

item.title: Chile elects far-right Jos√© Antonio Kast as next president
item.description: Many believe Kast will be the most right-wing president since Augusto Pinochet, who oversaw a 17-year dictatorship in Chile from 1973.

item.title: The difficult question of what it would take to stop Putin fighting in Ukraine
item.description: As peace talks continue in Berlin, what - if anything - could potentially change Putin's mind? And could Europe do anything differently?

item.title: Russia poses acute threat, new MI6 chief to warn
item.description: Blaise Metreweli will say the threat is posed by "an aggressive, expansionist and revisionist Russia".

item.title: How Bondi Beach shooting unfolded minute by minute
item.description: Correspondent Joe Inwood pieces together what verified footage reveals about how Australia's worst mass shooting in nearly three decades unfolded.
